articles.title: Hollywood-style Wrexham sign put up next to A483 - shropshirestar.com
articles.description: A huge Hollywood-style sign spelling out Wrexham has been erected alongside a busy trunk road near the town - a nod to the takeover of the Welsh town's football club by film stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney.
articles.content:
It is not known who is responsible for the enormous metal sign on the old spoil tip alongside the A483 at the junction for Rhostyllen.
But it is assumed to be connected to the take over of Wrexham A… [+1141 chars]
